Properties.Description: BLEA Governance Base: CMK for CloudTrail

Checks that the default security group of any Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) does not allow inbound or outbound traffic. The rule is non-compliant if the default security group has one or more inbound or outbound traffic.
CloudWatch Event Rule to send notification on Config Rule compliance changes.
Notify to create, update or delete a Security Group.
Notify to create, update or delete a Network ACL.
Notify to change on CloudTrail log configuration

Properties.AlarmDescription: Multiple unauthorized actions or logins attempted!
Warning: New IAM access Eey was created. Please be sure this action was neccessary.

Properties.Description: CloudWatch Event Rule to send notification on SecurityHub all new findings and all updates.
CloudWatch Event Rule to send notification on GuardDuty findings via SecurityHub.
